NAME: Varun .
ABOUT:
I am a Finance professional with extensive experience in financial modelling, business valuation, business writing and strategic research. I, currently, work at Moody's Analytics as a Senior Associate in Private Equity Consulting. My responsibilities include developing valuation and management models and conducting due-diligence for clients including major Investment Banks and Private Equity firms amongst others. 

In my previous engagement as a Financial Analyst with TresVista Analytics, I was responsible for the execution of valuation projects and managing client communications, involving research and analysis services. The tasks ranged from deal screening to industry analysis, and deal sourcing to portfolio monitoring. 

I hold a Bachelor of Management Studies (BMS), with specialization in finance from University of Delhi (2015-18), and have completed Derivatives Market (Dealers) and Equity Derivatives: A Beginner’s Module of the NCFM along with the Gold @ 18 program on Finance offered by NCDEX and IIFM.

To substantiate my finance credentials, I have cleared all the five modules for CFP certification, have successfully earned CFA Institute Investment Foundations certificate and am also pursuing the CFA program. 

I am also a Spring 2020 student at Stanford's Code in Place program on Python.

In 2016, I also had the opportunity of acquiring an entrepreneurship experience by founding ‘NETOPP: Network of Opportunities’, a web-based platform for latest news and events happening in major universities and college campuses across Delhi NCR.

I have also been active in the field of social services since 2015, as founding President of Rotaract Club of Young Visionaries, Vice President at Soul of Life Welfare Society and through Dressing the Souls NGO among others.

Please feel free to reach out and we can discuss for synergies!!
